Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enables certain members of the New York guard to be eligible to receive benefits under the recruitment incentive and retention program
Summary: Enables certain members of the New York guard to be eligible to receive benefits under the recruitment incentive and retention program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to tuition benefits for members of the New York state organized militia
